thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Robert Tooker Sr.
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Robert Tooker Sr.

author: Robert Tooker Sr.
title: Robert Tooker Sr.
text: BangGood is a great company to order from and have hundreds of products and shipping is Free, very good service easy to order and check out after you place an order, shipping from China to USA seems slow but just waite and a package will arrive most of the time but some orders seem to get lost in transit due to poor handeling at disterbution centers in the USA I will order from this company again.
